title: Snap-on Falls as Tariff Reality Overshadows Made-in-USA Pitch
summary: The article appears to discuss Snap-on's stock performance being negatively impacted by tariff concerns, despite the company's emphasis on domestic manufacturing.
content: Unfortunately, the full content appears to be behind a Bloomberg subscription wall and cannot be accessed. The available content only shows access restriction messages and robot verification prompts.
